results.content: I feel like he spent a large amount of time explaining basics for php and mySQL but when it came time to show examples (projects) he spent very little time.  There were several new concepts on section 4 that should have been the focus of this course.  I would suggest spending more time showing how to manipulate data from the Database using php, like showing how an update would look like, a delete and a create.
results.content_html: I feel like he spent a large amount of time explaining basics for php and mySQL but when it came time to show examples (projects) he spent very little time. There were several new concepts on section 4 that should have been the focus of this course. I would suggest spending more time showing how to manipulate data from the Database using php, like showing how an update would look like, a delete and a create.

results.content: Really good course to learn how to connect to the database and getting results from the database using mysql query. Liked it.
results.content_html: Really good course to learn how to connect to the database and getting results from the database using mysql query. Liked it.

results.content:
The overall experience was fine, I don't recall this being any different from other PHP / MySQL tutorials.  This could very well have been done on php5 and no one would have known the difference.  Missing some of the things from php7 include the <=> operator or the type declaration for functions would help this be a more educational video.  Also giving relevant names to the PHP lessons other than part-1 part-2 etc.

Overall though this was still a good intro to PHP and MySQL.
results.content_html:
The overall experience was fine, I don't recall this being any different from other PHP / MySQL tutorials. This could very well have been done on php5 and no one would have known the difference. Missing some of the things from php7 include the <=> operator or the type declaration for functions would help this be a more educational video. Also giving relevant names to the PHP lessons other than part-1 part-2 etc.

Overall though this was still a good intro to PHP and MySQL.
